text: Free Escape (Italian: Libera uscita) is a 1951 Italian comedy film directed by Duilio Coletti and starring Nino Taranto, Ludmilla Dudarova and Laura Gore.Sorrenti p.21 The film's sets were designed by Alberto Boccianti. It was made at Cinecittà. ==Cast== * Nino Taranto as Domenico Errichiello * Ludmilla Dudarova as Signora Quaglia * Laura Gore as Rosetta * Nyta Dover as Susanna * Luigi Pavese as Signor Quaglia * Carlo Croccolo as Pinozzo Molliconi * Elena Altieri * Guglielmo Inglese * Simona Gori * Galeazzo Benti * Arturo Bragaglia * Ciro Berardi * Enrico Luzi as Regista di fotoromanzi * Gigi Reder * Mario Lauri * Nerio Bernardi ==References== ==Bibliography== * Pasquale Sorrenti. Il cinema e la Puglia. Schena, 1984. ==External links== * Category:1951 films Category:1951 comedy films Category:Italian comedy films Category:Italian films Category:Italian-language films Category:Films directed by Duilio Coletti Category:Films shot at Cinecittà Studios
title: Free Escape
